31400.title: A Well-Kept Path
31400.description:
A path of flat white stones leads north and south. To either side
of the path are wildflowers in low-trimmed lawn. To the north is a
white gate. A number of people are here south of the gate, armed
with brushes and buckets of water.

31401.title: A Well-Kept Path
31401.description:
A path of flat white stones leads north and south. To either side
of the path are wildflowers in low-trimmed lawn. To the north is a
white gate, currently closed and locked. A number of people are here
south of the gate, armed with brushes and buckets of water.

31402.title: A Well-Kept Path
31402.description:
A path of flat white stones leads north and south. To either side
of the path are wildflowers in low-trimmed lawn. To the south is a
white gate, currently opened.

31403.title: A Turn in the Well-Kept Path
31403.description:
A path of flat white stones leads east and south. To either side
of the path are colorful wildflowers in low-trimmed lawn.

31404.title: A Well-Kept Path
31404.description:
A path of flat white stones leads east and west. To either side
of the path are colorful wildflowers in low-trimmed lawn.

31405.title: A Well-Kept Path
31405.description:
A path of flat white stones leads east and west. To either side
of the path are colorful wildflowers in low-trimmed lawn.

31406.title: A Turn in the Well-Kept Path
31406.description:
A path of flat white stones leads north and west. To either side
of the path are colorful wildflowers in low-trimmed lawn.

31407.title: A Well-Kept Path
31407.description:
A path of flat white stones leads north and south. To either side
of the path are colorful wildflowers in low-trimmed lawn.

31408.title: A Well-Kept Path
31408.description:
A path of flat white stones leads north and south. To either side
of the path are colorful wildflowers in low-trimmed lawn.

31409.title: A Turn in the Well-Kept Path
31409.description:
A path of flat white stones leads east and south. To either side
of the path are colorful wildflowers in low-trimmed lawn. To the
west is a pristine marble building. In bas-relief next to the
door is a paladinic figure, knightly, in a stance which portrays
both courage and mercy. The door to the building is closed, but
it does not appear locked. Above the door is a golden nameplate,
engraved upon which is the name, 'CEDRIC LIGHTSHIELD'.

31410.title: A Well-Kept Path
31410.description:
A path of flat white stones leads east and west. To either side
of the path are colorful wildflowers in low-trimmed lawn. In
the middle of the path, forcing it to go around it, is a lovely
marble and crystal fountain sending sprays of water into the
air.

31411.title: A Turn in the Well-Kept Path
31411.description:
A path of flat white stones leads north and west. To either side
of the path are colorful wildflowers in low-trimmed lawn.

31412.title: A Well-Kept Path
31412.description:
A path of flat white stones leads north and south. To either side
of the path are colorful wildflowers in low-trimmed lawn.

31413.title: A Turn in the Well-Kept Path
31413.description:
A path of flat white stones leads south and west. To either side
of the path are colorful wildflowers in low-trimmed lawn. To the
east is a pristine marble building. In bas-relief next to the door
is a figure of a paladin knight with what appears to be a Thera Ball
under one arm, while his other arm, or rather hand, wields a sword.
The door is closed, but it does not appear locked. Above the door
is a golden plaque with two names upon it. Above, you read,
'VLEDIMIRE' and below it, 'RENARD LAMONT SMITH'.

31414.title: A Well-Kept Path
31414.description:
A path of flat white stones leads east and west. To either side
of the path are colorful wildflowers in low-trimmed lawn.

31415.title: A Turn in the Well-Kept Path
31415.description:
A path of flat white stones leads north and east. To either side
of the path are colorful wildflowers in low-trimmed lawn.

31416.title: A Well-Kept Path
31416.description:
A path of flat white stones leads north and south. To either side
of the path are colorful wildflowers in low-trimmed lawn.

31417.title: A Turn in the Well-Kept Path
31417.description:
A path of flat white stones leads east and south. To either side
of the path are colorful wildflowers in low-trimmed lawn.

31418.title: A Well-Kept Path
31418.description:
A path of flat white stones leads west. To either side
of the path are colorful wildflowers in low-trimmed lawn. To
the east is a pristine marble building. In bas-relief next
to the door is the figure of a scribe with a feathered pen
writing a tome. The expression on the scribe's face appears
to be that of inspired joy. The door to the building is
closed, but it does not appear to be locked. Above this door
is a golden plaque bearing two names. The one above reads,
'ILPHRYNN DARMO'CHE' and the one below reads, 'PATRICK
WILLIAM LYNCH'.

31419.title: Inside the Cedric Lightshield Memorial
31419.description:
There is a sense of peace and holiness about this building. The
pristine white marble outside is nothing compared to the marblesque
walls and floor within. They practically glow with a holy aura.
On the north wall is a portrait of Cedric Lightshield. In the
middle of the room is a pedestal bearing a white book.

extras.description:
Standing before you is a tall and nobole-looking man.  He
is a human, nearly six and a half feet and just over two
hunderd pounds.  He is dressed in little armor, for he
needs it not.  What little he does wear is in superior
shape.  His armor is clean and polished and his sword is
scabbarded at his side.  An ascended member of the
Pantheon, he now keeps vigil over Thera with a watchful
eye.
As you look upon him the first thing you notice is a
strange and powerful sense of serenity.  His crystal blue
eyes look about the room calmly, looking for anything of
interest.  His face is quite solid-looking and worn from
the many places and things he has seen.  His brow shows
wrinkles from the many days in service of Cirdan, Valor
and the Paladin Guild.
Grey hair frames his face, falling down to his shoulders.
Though he appears old and grey, an aura of renewed purpose
and vitality surrounds him.  A kind smile crosses his face
as he turns to go.  He has lessons to teach, lessons about
kindness, mercy and purity for the people of Thera.

31420.title: Inside the Vledimire Memorial
31420.description:
There is a sense of peace and holiness about this building. The
pristine white marble outside is nothing compared to the marblesque
walls and floor within. They practically glow with a holy aura.
On the north wall is a portrait of Vledimire. A framed scroll hangs
upon the eastern wall. In the middle of the room is a pedestal
bearing a white book.

extras.description:
Judging from his well polished elysium armoring, he is a Knightly fashion.
Most of his body is covered in a some kind of armoring so his physical
stature is not visable.  A helmet covers his head hiding everything but illuminating
red eyes, that can be seen from within two eye slits.  A broad pair of brass
colored wings extend from the Knight's back draping toward the ground.
Wielded in one hand is a longsword with an eerie glow.  A rather large shield
is held in the other hand, blocking the entire view of the left side of the Knight.
A tightly strung grey silken sash is wrapped around the waist and connected to
the leather belt that holds the lower part of his armor together.  Upon the sash
words art written that spell "Envoy".  Even further investigation will
show, a small brass tail that seems to be behind the Knight.  His feet
are adorned in some rather thick boots of some kind, but sharp claws seem
to be protruding the front portion of the boots.  Strapped to the back and
waist side of the Knight are a multitude of different types of weapons.
Some glowing with the same eerie hum as the longsword and others looking
rather dull grey compared to those that do glow.  Upon the chest plate of
this knight, an insignia of some kind can be seen.  It is a very Large Warhammer.
Upon the shoulder guards of the knight there is a symbol of a Dagger.
The large shield is adorned by a symbol as well, that of a huge Broadsword.

At the top of the scroll in neat handwriting are the words:
Vledimire's Early History
by Renard Lamont Smith
Vledimire is an unusual mortal of the Draconian race.
He once served in a group of traveling mercenaries, that
killed for wealth and riches.  One day he robbed a Paladin
and got much gold from the Knight's wears.  The gang turned
on him when they seem how much he got from his loot,
ironically he was saved by a under-dressed knight, that
he robbed.  Vledimire was amazed that a man would save
him even after he robbed him down to nothing.  Thus the
knight took the young warrior under his wings and taught
him the ways of the Paladins.  The virtues of obedience
and honour would be come the things Vledimire now cherished.
After training for years as a squire for knights, he
watched and seen how they were slowly becoming as prideful
and arrogant as the evil they were trying to deminish.
He asked why they would use the blessed magics to simply
do chores that we could do on our own with little energy
on their own.  His questions were met with obscure looks
and low snarls.  Once he reached the ranking of Knight
he set out on his own.  He bid the knight that took him
in farewell, as do all squires when they reach knighthood.
He sought to find why he felt this way, and find others
that felt the same way as he did.  He leaves his life in
the hands of fate.  He shall venture into Thera and find
out more about this...Crusader and the Lord Darkwood that
guides them in a code of Honor.  He wishes to know what
life has in store for him.  He shall not stop until he
finds the answers he seeks, thus his adventure begins...

31421.title: Inside the Ilphrynn Darmo'che Memorial
31421.description:
There is a sense of peace and holiness about this building. The
pristine white marble outside is nothing compared to the marblesque
walls and floor within. They practically glow with a holy aura.
On the north wall is a portrait of Ilphrynn. In the middle of the
room is a pedestal bearing a white book.

extras.description:
(Black Aura) A grotesque, rotting corpse is here.
Cursed with immortality, Ilphrynn's horrific appearance stands as testimony
to his eternal torment. His skin, once a striking ebony in life, is now
pale and sallow. Stretched tight across thin bones, his flesh is coated
with countless oozing maggots crawling ceaselessly over one another.
Beneath the writhing mass of these disgusting creatures you are able
to glimpse patches of skin into which have been carved jagged, Abyssal
runes that pulse and crackle with bursts of negative energy. Ilphrynn's
eyes, a filthy shade of yellow ocher, are cold and dead. A black ichor
seeps from their corners, running in tiny rivulets down his sunken cheeks.
The white, feathered wings of an angel sprout from his back, yet, they
are by no means beautiful. Chunks of the downy feathers have been torn
free and the same black ichor that leaks from his eyes is spattered
in thick globs across their impressive span. His slender, nearly skeletal,
fingers bear jagged, two-inch talons which he slowly clicks against
one another. A rapier, its hilt bound with tarnished silver cording,
rests loosely in the unadorned, red-leather scabbard fastened about
his waist upon a belt of woven intestines. Hanging from the other side
of this disgusting belt is a five-headed whip of writhing, black flames.

31422.title: Inside the Vledimire Memorial
31422.description:
There is a sense of peace and holiness about this building. The
pristine white marble outside is nothing compared to the marblesque
walls and floor within. They practically glow with a holy aura. For now,
nothing adorns the bright, practically glowing marble walls of this part
of the Memorial. In the center of the room is a pedestal with a book
upon it.
